doc.title: Istanbul tatili
doc.plot: Ali wants to work as a photographer for a newspaper, yet at the moment he works as a street photographer. Princess Nilgun comes to Istanbul with her father Sultan El Hasim of Katras. Nilgun runs away from her father. Ali finds her sleeping on a bench and takes her home. He doesn't believe she is a princess and takes her photos. Nilgun wants to return to to her father. Ali follows her with his friend. They meet again and Nilgun stays with Ali, they fall in love. At the meantime, El Hasim alerts the police about his daughter's missing. Ali doesn't want to sell her photos. The two lovers have to part. El Hasim and Nilgun leave the country with their yacht. But surprises await Ali and Nilgun!
